nodes.text: Located in Eriadu City, the Eriadu Governor's Palace was be the home to both governmental power in Seswenna sector and Eriadu's governor. This ziqqurat-shaped building—somewhat similar to many Jedi and Sith temples—was seemingly located near some sort of haven.

Wilhuff Tarkin became "de facto" owner of this mansion by 29 BBY, when Palpatine made him full governor of the Seswenna Sector. He had previously been Lieutenant governor and had lived in a different mansion. When he became Tarkin's personal slave years later, the Calamarian Gial Ackbar would perform most of the household duties in this luxurious hall.
